title: **Your haven from a busy lifestyle! Calm and quiet 2 bed / 2 bath
posting_body: ['Come and see what the fuss is all about at The Bluffs at Castle Rock Apartments, located at 483 Scott Blvd Castle Rock, CO 80104.', 'Description', '........', 'Inside your apartment, you will enjoy high-quality features like gas fireplaces, 9-foot ceilings, walk-in closets, an attached balcony/patio, and plenty of storage space.', 'Many of our apartments even include an in-home washer and dryer!', 'Also, our community is pet-friendly with a limit of 2 pets per apartment.', 'Visit our amenities page to see what you can look forward to when you make the move to The Bluffs at Castle Rock.', 'show contact info', 'Bedrooms', '........... 2', 'Bathrooms', '......... 2', 'Sq Footage', '......... 1026 -
